price: obtienen de ellos otros beneficios, y [de ellos extraen leche] para beber. ¿Es que no van a ser agradecidos?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
